page.title: 17Singleton Church.
page.content: The Church dates back to before 1000 A.D. It was owned by the great Earl of Godwine(who gave his name to Goodwood) ,father of King Harold.The present church is mostly the same as it was in Saxon times,except for the aisles,which were added later.The nave walls are Saxon.If you stand in the central aisle,you can see the upper window over the chancel arch which lit the room below the bell tower.This window has still got the original medieval glass in it.If you look back,then you will see the Saxon doorway. There are a number of tombs, several of which are the tombs of members of the Fitzalan family. The Fitzalans were the Earls of Arundel.
